content: So this was me, a few weeks ago. I was just getting started with Android Wear development based on an Udacity Android Developer Nanodegree project. Stage 1: Where I was forced to reach out for help. Stage 2: Where I finally figured things out. Stage 3: Where I wrote a tutorial on Developing for Android Wear I almost forgot to include Stage 4: Where the article inspires other developers to experiment with Android Wear :) This is a technique that, in your words, “will let you bask in the sunlight of those highs more often than you spend in the dark depths of the lows.” Here’s the link to the Medium article in the image above. https://medium.com/@moyinoluwa/developing-for-android-wear-a-noob-s-perspective-de47c4686ffb#.xjfnh9saf
